item.title: Good to Great
item.description: hings started at one of my friends brought a Macbook Pro (Apple) same as mine, and I will like to set up a environment like mine. First you may want to edit some file in your terminal like a HACKER-MAN, and Vim is the most use text editor in terminal. So let’s get started! Find and open your terminal.‌ You can found it simply type “terminal” in your spotlight. (Optional) Open Vim and see what is vimrc.
